name: Pylon Eco Token
description: It is a Decentralised Finance (DeFi) based Governance Token, with the benefit of Utility Token, Security Token & CryptoCurrency. It is Deflationary, also provides Staking Reward. We are the first in the Crypto Industry to offer a Buyback Guarantee of all ICO Tokens. It is used in plenty of our Open-source ecosystem projects in Daily life. Through the different ecosystem projects, we can bring the mass adoption of crypto globally.
